nodes.text: Petula (miscredited as Petulia) was the name of a walrus that frequented a zoo in California. Named for singer Petula Clark, Ben Burtt used her vocalizations as a basis for Chewbacca's voice, alongside other animals.

Tim Veekhoven and Mark Newbold's blog post on StarWars.com, Drawing from the Present: Familiar Creatures in a Galaxy Far, Far Away, mentions that Ponda Baba's voice was based on that of a walrus, although they were unsure if this too was Petula.
